lead_paragraph: Marc Gicquel saved two match points to reach the Lyon final in France for the second straight year by beating the qualifier Alejandro Falla, 4-6, 6-2, 7-6 (9). Gicquel, bidding for his first ATP title, will take on Sébastien Grosjean today in an all-French final. Grosjean defeated his compatriot Jo-Wilfried Tsonga, 6-1 6-2.
